ChangeLog
=========

.. contents:: Releases

1.0 (2024-05-14)
----------------

* Drop support for python 3.7.
* Add support for python 3.11.
* Add support for python 3.12.
* Fix for tox 4.15.
* Update project setup.

0.3 (2023-02-02)
----------------

* Update for tox v4.

0.2 (2022-10-13)
----------------

* Fix interaction with provision tox.
* Use github actions.
* Update project setup.

0.1 (2020-02-26)
----------------

Initial version.
